Name: Beers and Boomerangs
About the game: Kangaroos are trying to steal your beer! Throw boomerangs in VR to survive the wildlife chaos. Cook for your mates, and save your Aussie BBQ! Have increasingly perilous BBQs where you survive against different animals, in different scenarios and cook different food!
